game.title: The Missing Princess
game.objective: Find and rescue the missing princess from the dragon's lair.
game.description: The princess of the kingdom has been kidnapped by a dragon and taken to its lair. The king has offered a reward to anyone who can bring her back safely.

task.description: The dragon's lair is located in the mountains to the north of the kingdom. It is a dark and dangerous place, filled with traps and monsters.
In order to free the princess, the dragon must be defeated. The dragon is a powerful creature, so the party will need to use all of their skills and abilities.
Once the dragon is defeated, rescue the princess from her lair. The princess may be imprisoned in a cell or held captive by the dragon's servants.
After saving the princess, bring her back to receive your reward.
